question: Ashish Kumar Srivastava has appointed as MD, CEO of this company.
explanation: Private life insurance company PNB MetLife has appointed Ashish Kumar Srivastava as Managing Director and Chief Executive Officer. He will be responsible for leading all aspects of the business in the country. Srivastava joined PNB MetLife in 2013 as the Head of Human Resources before subsequently moving to Dubai in 2015 to take charge of Human Resources for the MetLife Middle East and Africa (MEA) region. Prior to joining PNB MetLife, Ashish served as Director on the board of Canara HSBC Oriental Bank of Commerce Life Insurance.
